name: Space Weapons Inc
description:
This is a college project of mine created with unreal engine I plan to continue. I hope you enjoy :)

It has a bigger premise and scope, but this is effectively a lil demo reel for game my Game Animation abilities. 

All visual elements, (except for the unreal engine default explosion) were created by me.

It of course, contains copyrighted audio:

- Various Star Fox 64 SFX

- Popcorn (DJ AG REMIX)  (Check out DJ AG on Youtube, his stuff is great and chill.)

- September -Earth Wind and Fire
